import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from './Button.js' import "./Navbar.css" function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const [button, setButton] = useState(true) const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false) const showButton = () => { if (window.innerWidth <= 960) { setButton(false) } else { setButton(true) } } window.addEventListener('resize', showButton); return (
  • Home
  • Services
  • Products
  • Sign Up
{button && }
) } export default Navbar
